Vulnerabilities.Description: Acunetix 360 identified a web server (Nginx) in the target web server's HTTP response.

HttpRequest.Content:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: php.testsparker.com
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5
Cache-Control: no-cache
Referer:http://php.testsparker.com/
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/79.0.3945.0 Safari/537.36
X-Scanner: Acunetix 360

Vulnerabilities.Impact: This issue is reported as additional information only. There is no direct impact arising from this issue.
Vulnerabilities.Name: Nginx Web Server Identified
